column4: hello, i have xp and knoppinx instalation on one hd i want to change knoppix for ubuntu, can i just format the knoppix install and run the ubuntu cd?
Yes. Or you could even resize the hard drive and install Ubuntu, Knoppix, and XP.
can i use the same swap or i have to mate 2 more partitions for that?
You can use the same. You might even be able to keep the same /home but I could be wrong. Probably to be safe you shouldn't.
